name: Oil Baron
description: The game has 7 locations with special tasks. You must fulfill them until the end of the day. It can be used to collect N amount of oil or earn several thousand $. To start playing, you need to choose the complexity of the game. There are 5 difficulty levels (easy-normal-difficult-very complicated-insane).
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7/8/10 Процессор: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Оперативная память: 1024 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 500MB DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 100 MB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 7/8/10 Процессор: 2 Ghz Оперативная память: 2048 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 1 GB DirectX: Версии 11 Место на диске: 250 MB
